edge: During the COVID-19 pandemic, a group of people recorded children playing in a church and it was included in the trailer for Dune.
Hans Zimmer supervised a 32-person choir via FaceTime to record a cover of Pink Floyd's song "Eclipse" for the first Dune trailer due to pandemic restrictions.
